rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C135011

self.title: CDISC SDTM Pharmacogenomics/Genetics Methods and Supporting Information Test Name Terminology

definition: A terminology codelist to describe the test name/code for omics data methods and supporting information.
name: Pharmacogenomics/Genetics Methods and Supporting Information Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Pharmacogenomics/Genetics Methods and Supporting Information Test Name Terminology
synonyms: Pharmacogenomics/Genetics Methods and Supporting Information Test Name

terms.definition: The number of nucleotides that make up a genetic sequence of interest.
The nucleotide location that represents the beginning of a genetic sequence of interest.
The sequence of nucleotide residues along a genetic sub-region of interest. (NCI)
The anticipated or extrapolated frequency of a single nucleotide polymorphism within a population.
